name: Clint Eastwood
wikiSummary: According to the Clint Eastwood Songfacts, the reason the song is called Clint Eastwood is because of the strange harmonica-like instrument (known as a Melodica) used in the background. The same instrument was used in Eastwood's movie A Fistful of Dollars.
wikiText: According to the Clint Eastwood Songfacts, the reason the song is called Clint Eastwood is because of the strange harmonica-like instrument (known as a Melodica) used in the background. The same instrument was used in Eastwood's movie A Fistful of Dollars. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
